tool_description: Creates replacement orders for lost, damaged, or undelivered items with expedited shipping options.

original_order_id.description: ID of the original order being replaced

items_to_replace.description: List of item SKUs or line item IDs to replace

expedited_shipping.description: Whether to use expedited shipping for replacement

shipping_address_override.description: Alternative shipping address if different from original

waive_shipping_cost.description: Whether to waive shipping costs for replacement order

error_messages: Original order not found: The specified original order ID does not exist.
Items unavailable: One or more items to replace are out of stock.
Invalid item list: One or more item SKUs are not valid or were not in the original order.
Address validation failed: The shipping address override is not valid.
Customer account issue: Customer account status prevents creating replacement orders.
usage: Provide original_order_id and items_to_replace. Optionally specify expedited_shipping preferences and address overrides. The tool creates a new order and returns tracking information.

replacement_order_id.description: Unique ID for the newly created replacement order

tracking_number.description: Tracking number for the replacement shipment

estimated_delivery.description: Estimated delivery date for replacement order

total_cost.description: Total cost of replacement order including any shipping charges
